privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera usage is required for video calls and the verification process.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Microphone usage is required for video calls.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Photo library usage is required to send photo messages in chat.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location country is used to help us find matching content creators. Your exact location is never shared.
